title: Glacier on the move
brief_description: Shows a glacier in action, illustrating the rhythm of glacial movement in summer and winter, and the effects of gravity, temperature and pressure on glacial movement.
description: Shows a glacier in action, illustrating the rhythm of glacial movement in summer and winter, and the effects of gravity, temperature and pressure on glacial movement.
